question: The UK-India Year of Culture 2017 recently kicked off in London. The purpose of the celebration is
option1: To celebrate the 70th anniversary of Indian independence
option2: To acknowledge the Indian Diaspora settled in the UK
option3: To celebrate the deep cultural ties between the two nations and the 70th year of Indian Independence
answer: To celebrate the deep cultural ties between the two nations and the 70th year of Indian Independence
